title: St.Galler Kantonalbank Works With SEBA Bank to Offer Swiss Customers Bitcoin, Ethereum
description: The first tier of customers will be wealth management clients , but retail customers are next in line, and other coins and staking services are also planned, said SEBA Bank's Christian Bieri.

title: PayPal registered to offer crypto services in the UK, with restrictions
description:
Payment giant PayPal has successfully registered with the United Kingdom’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) to offer crypto services in the country, according to the regulator’s website. The registration, effective Oct. 31, allows PayPal to undertake certain crypto asset activities with the FCA’s permission. Registered, but restricted Despite PayPal’s registration, the payment processor still faces several […]

The post PayPal registered to offer crypto services in the UK, with restrictions appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: UK Government Announces £118 Million Funding to Boost AI Skills
description: In a significant move to bolster the United Kingdom’s artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities, the government has unveiled plans to allocate £118 million in funding towards enhancing AI skills across the nation. The initiative, spearheaded by Secretary of State Michelle Donelan, aims to harness AI’s immense potential while ensuring its ethical and responsible application. Investment highlights ... Read more

title: Ripple’s Legal Chief Highlights ‘Troubling Pattern’ of SEC Case Losses – Guaranteed Win in XRP Lawsuit?
description: Ripple Labs won a critical lawsuit against the SEC, clearing executives of charges and challenging the SEC’s regulatory approach. The Fifth Circuit Court ruled the SEC’s stock buyback disclosure rule arbitrary, demanding a better explanation of their decisions. Ripple’s legal team, led by Chief Legal Officer Stuart Alderoty, has pointed out what he perceives as [...]

title: BTC Could Be Getting Ready for a Strong Bull Move, Says Analyst
description:
The X user PeckShieldAlert revealed in a post earlier today that 3 dormant Bitcoin (BTC) addresses transferred a substantial amount of BTC to new addresses. In the post, the X user revealed that these addresses have been inactive for the past 6 years, and transferred 6.5K BTC, worth approximately $224.75 million, to new addresses over […]

The post BTC Could Be Getting Ready for a Strong Bull Move, Says Analyst appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Wiki Finance Expo Sydney 2023 Is Coming Soon!
description:
Regulation, Forex, Crypto, Web 3.0, Metaverse, AI, ESG Will Be in Focus.
